prompt: What is the benefit of using a bulleted list in this passage?
description:
When you have a doctor’s appointment, it’s a good idea to do a little preparation to get the most out of your time with your doctor.

  • Make a list of questions to ask.
  • Make a list of medications you are taking including prescription and non-prescription drugs, vitamins, and natural remedies.
  • Consider asking a friend or family member to come with you.
feedback: The benefit of using a bulleted list in this passage is that it makes it easier to quickly understand the steps to prepare for a doctor’s appointment. Bullets make it easier to understand a series or list. If a bulleted list doesn’t make the text easier to understand, then it’s not a good formatting choice.
